title: Shocking new claims about Natalee Holloway's fate
itunes:title: Shocking new claims about Natalee Holloway's fate
description:
The latest installment in Oxygen's docuseries "The Disappearance of Natalee Holloway" features an interrogation of John Ludwick, the man who claims he helped suspected killer Joran van Der Sloot rebury the Alabama woman's remains after burning and crushing her skull. Investigative reporter Art Harris and forensics expert Joseph Scott Morgan join Nancy Grace in a discussion of the revelations.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
